mcq.statement: Identify the sentence that uses a correct transitional word: The movie had an outstanding plot, unless the pacing was a bit slow in the second half, The movie had an outstanding plot, and the pacing was a bit slow in the second half, The movie had an outstanding plot, yet the pacing was a bit slow in the second half, The movie had an outstanding plot, for the pacing was a bit slow in the second half

options.a: The movie had an outstanding plot, unless the pacing was a bit slow in the second half
options.b: The movie had an outstanding plot, and the pacing was a bit slow in the second half
options.c: The movie had an outstanding plot, yet the pacing was a bit slow in the second half
